extendedInfo.description: EazyRedirect is a widget that provides 1 click for call forwarding.This application is widget. So to use it, you need to go and find it in widget list (which is usually accessible by long click on home screen). In widget list you need to select EazyRedirect widget, setup settings and it will show on your screen.NB!!! Before you use call forwarding, first ask your mobile carrier about price for this service. In some countries this service may cost money!!!This version only supports mostly Europe call forwarding MMI code (*21*).NB!!! New feature, what was added in version 1.2, makes annoying dialog with "OK" button hidden and give minus 1 click for user. This feature require device to be  restarted. This feature probably will not work on SONY ERICSSON XPERIA devices due big changes in android API by this manufacture. If you will find this widget useful, but your mobile operator use different MMI code for call forwarding, just send email to aipok.apps@gmail.com with info about your MMI codes and I will add more functionality. So more of you can use this tool.Any comments also can be send to aipok.apps@gmail.com. I always like to get feedback from users to improve my self and my application.If you like my widget vote for it.Before set negative vote, please send feedback to aipok.apps@gmail.com and may be we can find solution for your problem.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really good app that does the job. Remember to turn off after use itherwise your calls will be constantly diverted - not an app fault but it might be better to have a pre determined timescale as to how long the divert stays switched on far. Only a minor quibble on an otherwise near prrfect app.
